name: LITTLE BROTHER CHARITABLE TRUST (LBCT)
briefDescription: The target group of the trust would be the following,we help1. Women and their children deserted by husband2. Widows and their Children and their dependents3. socially and economically weaker persons4. Needy school and college students5. person who had lost their Health.6. Mentally retarded person, living particularly on road side-without any care.7. Physically Handicapped persons and their children and dependents, Orphaned indigent and other less privileged persons in distress, children , Education and literacy , minority issues, vocational training womens
